About Us

Help celebrate a special day or commemorate a significant ocassion with a sweet treat from Sugar Room Bakery.
Whether you are searching for a special birthday cake, or simply looking for a sweet ending to an everday meal, Sugar Room is sure to have something freshly baked to suit your mood.
We are proud to offer a wide variety of freshly baked goods daily, including gourmet cakes, cokies, pies, cheesecakes, brownies and over 20 flavours of cupcakes that no one can resist.
